Keywords: Arkham Asylum , Gotham City Sirens , Gotham City Underworld , Scientist , Suicide Squad
Real Name: Harleen Quinzel and Pamela Isley
Special Powers
HEY...WAIT FOR ME!!: When Harley and Ivy is KO'd by an attack, before removing them from the game, you may generate a character named Harley Quinn and/or a character named Poison Ivy from your Sideline on their last non-KO clicks, then heal them each 2 clicks. The total points of the generated characters must be equal to or less than Harley and Ivy's point value. Protected: Pulse Wave.
A NIGHT ON THE TOWN: Charge, Flurry, Stealth.
SORRY FELLAS, YOU'RE NOT OUR TYPE: Poison, Smoke Cloud. Smoke Cloud as FREE, but only to generate 2 markers. // Friendly characters within range have SAFEGUARD: Poison.
SET 'EM UP FOR ME, RED!: When Harley and Ivy attacks, modify attack and damage +1 for each action token on all targets.
